Name: Scotch Negroni
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange slice wheel.
STRAIN into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).
Review: On the bitter side of bittersweet and, depending on your Scotch, faintly smoky.
Nutrition: One serving of Scotch Negroni contains 182 calories
